page.title: 05A DAY AT SUTTON SCHOOL
page.content: I live in Sutton and go to the village school.In the morning I get up,get dressed and have my breakfast.Then I get ready for school.I go to school in my mummy's car.When I get there,I play in the playground until 9 o'clock when we go in and have assembly.After that we do some lessons like mathematics and English.At 10-45am we have playtime.I like to play with my friends or go on the climbing frame.After play,we do some more work until 12 o'clock when we have lunch.Most children bring a packed lunch but some have a school meal which is brought from Southlands School in Biggleswade.We play until 1-15pm and then have afternoon school. In the afternoon we often do painting, craft or needlework.At 3 o'clock we have a story and go home at 3-30pm.
